text: Neonatal infant pain scale (NIPS) (for <2 months) Observe for 1 minute FACIAL EXPRESSION Relaxed Contracted - CRY Absent Mumbling Vigorous BREATHING Relaxed Different than basal - ARMS Relaxed Flexed/ stretched - LEGS Relaxed Flexed/ stretchec - ALERTNESS Sleeping/calm Uncomfortable - Pain score rating: 0-2 = No pain, 3-4 = Moderate, >4 = Severe
